Posts.Content: shocked wrote: I was diagnosed with stage 3 breast cancer yesterday.  I do not have a medical aid and would just like to know what the financial burden is going to be now.  Even just a +- figure of the chemo treatment. Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Jul 24, 2008 09:26AM shocked wrote: I am from South Africa, Western Cape.  I am going to a clinic in the next month but they say that it depends on so many things so they can't tell me what it's going to cost, not even +-.  I am single but do have 2 sisters left as family. I am just so confused at the moment but will go to my regular doctor as you said for anti depressents. Thank you for you advice.
